meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Eric Vernon Brook North Julie Brannon Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7499.

td.p: Eric Vernon, a retired government relations specialist from Ottawa, Ontario, Canada
Brook North, an attorney from Raleigh, North Carolina
Julie Brannon, a professor of English from Jacksonville, Florida (whose 2-day cash winnings total $47,200)

tr.td: (Alex: First, I want you to join me on...)
A VISIT TO THE CIA
TOOL TIME
THE ORIGINAL LANGUAGE
THEY COME IN FOURS
(Alex: According to Forbes, they're...)
DEAD BUT STILL EARNING IN 2016
ONE DIRECTION

toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'George H.W. Bush

Julie
')

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Julie
Brook
Eric
"I" THE WORLD
(Alex: And that means that each correct response will begin with that letter.)
FEMALE TV COPS
PEN NAMES
MICROSOFT WORD
(Alex: Each correct response will be a word that can be made of the letters you find in "Microsoft".)
HAS GOOD BONES
NEEDS SOME WORK

(including 3 DDs),
